document_name_accent: ung thu bieu mo ong tuyen vu tai cho.json
document_title: Ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS): Symptoms and treatment
subsection_content:
DCIS usually does not have any signs or symptoms. However, DCIS can sometimes cause signs such as:
A breast tumor.; Nipple bleeding.; DCIS is often found on mammograms and appears as clusters of small microcalcifications of irregular shape and size.
subsection_title: ung thu bieu mo ong tuyen vu tai cho.json. Signs of ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS)
subsection_data:
ung thu bieu mo ong tuyen vu tai cho.json. Signs of ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS)
DCIS usually does not have any signs or symptoms. However, DCIS can sometimes cause signs such as:
A breast tumor.; Nipple bleeding.; DCIS is often found on mammograms and appears as clusters of small microcalcifications of irregular shape and size.
